message.text: “A good prompt is the key to unlocking AI's treasure trove of knowledge.

items.title: Generative AI Overview

items.content: Principles of clear, specific and precise language when communicating with AI.

items.content: Write prompts for emails, marketing content, and preliminary data analysis.

items.title: Troubleshooting & Refining
